sentences.sContent: That causes your test to terminate prematurely, too, of course.
sentences.sContent_eng: That causes your test to terminate prematurely, too, of course.
sentences.sCn: 当然，那也将导致你的测试过早地终止。

sentences.sContent: Yet as any programmer knows, it would be a mistake to optimise prematurely.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet as any programmer knows, it would be a mistake to optimise prematurely.
sentences.sCn: 正如任何程序员所知道的那样，过早地优化可能是一个错误。

sentences.sContent: ...the early-decision system needlessly and prematurely narrows the field of possibility just at a time when students should be opening themselves to a whole range of thrilling options...

words.tran: 早产的；不成熟的；比预期早的
早产儿；过早发生的事物
